name: SYNTH WIZARD
description:
Dev Log: 


SYNTH WIZARD was made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 47 Jam, October 2-5, 2020.

"Synth Wizard" is a Musical Tower Defense game where the dungeon is stuck in a musical loop. Survive three rounds to win!

STORY:

The SYNTH WIZARD and his faithful companion the METRO-GNOME embark on a DANGEROUS QUEST!  They must clear the dungeons to find the fabled ANCIENT SYNTH!  By harnessing the POWER of MUSIC they will SET TRAPS and STOP the MONSTERS! Every instrument has a SECRET!

MADE BY:

John-Michael Veach: Concept, Programming, Music and Sound

Dakota Cummins: Concept, Art
